DRIVIN (KAR Auction Services) | Frontend Software Engineer | Chicago | Full Time, Contract-to-Hire

DRIVIN a recently acquired startup in the used auto industry. We're a data science company at our core but we build amazing software products around our data to help dealers optimize their car lots. Our teams are nice, smart, and fun. We really love to brag about our culture here.

Open positions across engineering but I'm here for my team, the front end! (Not a remote position!)

- Build, maintain, and update user-facing features for a long-term project - Apply technical knowledge to advance and scope solutions - Write modular, composable code for flexibility and re-use - Integrate with a shared micro-services, separate concerns between logic and interface - Optimize processes and applications for efficiency, scalability, and availability - Communicate effectively, giving and receiving help as needed; give first, take later!

Our stack is React, Webpack, Redux, and Node. Full stack includes Java, Python, PSQL, R, and Apache.

https://kar.wd1.myworkdayjobs.com/KAR_Careers/2/refreshFacet...

Or, email me directly with your resume, LinkedIn, and/or Github: ddigangi@drivindealer.com
